query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_bid_item_detail
 WHERE demandyear = '@{variables('demandyear')}' 
  AND  dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  orntcode = '@{variables('orntcode')}'
  ;
 
select 1 as success

query.value:
delete from  cd_ods.tb_d2b_cmpt_bid_notice_detail
 WHERE dcsno = '@{variables('dcsno')}'
  AND  pblancNo = '@{variables('pblancno')}'
  AND  pblancOdr = '@{variables('pblancodr')}'
  AND  pblancdate = '@{variables('pblancdate')}'
  ;
 
select 1 as success

activities.name: set pblancdate
activities.description: 당일자

activities.name: set anmtDateBegin
activities.description: 당일자

activities.name: set opengDateEnd
activities.description: 당일자

query.value:
SELECT demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  iemno, opengdate
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
     , a.iemno  AS iemno
     , a.opengdate  AS opengdate
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_company_list b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.demandyear = b.demandyear
  AND a.iemno = b.iemno
  AND a.orntcode = b.orntcode
  WHERE a.opengdate BETWEEN  '20210101%' AND '20221231'
   AND a.bidresult != '유찰'
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'
;

SELECT
demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  iemno, opengdate, pblancno, pblancodr
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.pblancno AS pblancno
     , a.pblancOdr AS pblancOdr
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
     , a.iemno  AS iemno
     , a.opengdate  AS opengdate
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_detail b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.pblancno = b.pblancno
  AND a.pblancOdr = b.pblancOdr
WHERE a.opengdate LIKE '2021%'
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'

activities.name: set openstdt
activities.description: 오픈시작

activities.name: set openenddt
activities.description: 당일자

activities.name: get totalcount
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

query.value:
SELECT
demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  iemno, opengdate, pblancno, pblancodr
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.pblancno AS pblancno
     , a.pblancOdr AS pblancOdr
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
     , a.iemno  AS iemno
     , a.opengdate  AS opengdate
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_detail b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.pblancno = b.pblancno
  AND a.pblancOdr = b.pblancOdr
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'

SELECT
demandyear , dcsno , orntcode ,  iemno, opengdate
FROM 
(
SELECT COALESCE (b.dcsno, 'xxxxx') AS b_dcsno 
     , a.dcsno AS dcsno
     , a.orntcode  AS orntcode
     , a.demandyear  AS demandyear
     , a.iemno  AS iemno
     , a.opengdate  AS opengdate
FROM cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_list a
  LEFT OUTER join   cd_ods.tb_d2b_competition_bid_result_company_list b
on a.dcsno  = b.dcsno
  AND a.demandyear = b.demandyear
  AND a.iemno = b.iemno
  AND a.orntcode = b.orntcode
  WHERE to_Char(a.if_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = to_Char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') 
   and a.bidresult != '유찰'
) a
WHERE a.b_dcsno = 'xxxxx'
;
